description: I. Letter dated 23/01/2009 from Alan Cook, Managing Director of Post Office Ltd. to James Paice MP regarding a statistical error in their original reply to Mr. Paice in respect of Question no. 243171. Includes correct statistics. 1 p. II. Letter dated 23/01/2009 from Alan Cook, Managing Director of Post Office Ltd. to Nick Herbert MP regarding same. 1 p.
department: Dept for Business, Enterprise and Regulatory Reform
